tictactoe

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • tictactoe.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is designed to edit the values of a tic-tac-toe Board

    • Field Summary

      static char BLANK

      static char CROSS

      boolean isLegalMove(int location)
      Tests for if the player is playing on a position that has been played already.
      boolean placeMarkAt(int location, char mark)
      Makes sure the move is legal, then marks it with the correct input
      void resetBoard()
      resets the Board to all blank cells

    • Method Detail

      • isLegalMove

        public boolean isLegalMove(int location)
        Tests for if the player is playing on a position that has been played already. Data input is not vetted
        Parameters:
        location - - Location of the cell being chosen
        Returns:
        - true if they can play there, otherwise false

      • placeMarkAt

        public boolean placeMarkAt(int location,
                           char mark)
        Makes sure the move is legal, then marks it with the correct input
        Parameters:
        location - - Location of the cell being chosen
        mark - - The mark of the player (i.e CROSS or CIRCLE)
        Returns:
        - true if cell is changed, false otherwise

      • getMarkAt

        public char getMarkAt(int location)
        Tells the code what the value of a given cell is
        Parameters:
        location - - Location of the cell being chosen
        Returns:
        - value of the cell chosen

      • hasThreeInRow

        public boolean hasThreeInRow(char mark)

      • resetBoard

        public void resetBoard()
        resets the Board to all blank cells
